channel.description: Recent content in on-line SPR on Xuan Pan

item.title: An online Self-Paced Rading (SPR) Task Demo
item.description: Online Self-Paced Reading Participants read the sentences in an online moving window SPR task in which they control their own pace of reading by pressing the spacebar. Data were collected on how long (in ms) it takes to read each word in the sentence. Click HERE for a demo of the online SPR task in English. (The experiment was created with PsychoPy and hosted on Pavlovia.)
